titles.title: To extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on certain men's footwear covering the ankle with coated or laminated textile fabrics.
To extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on certain men's footwear covering the ankle with coated or laminated textile fabrics.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2011, the duty on certain men's footwear covering the ankle with coated or laminated textile fabrics.
